May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Great piece. Interesting to compare her to the common Black Widow from WotR - one's a team player (and has the TA to prove it), giving Stealth to Avengers, Sidestep-Outwitting, and maybe not even making attacks herself. This one's the opposite: total loner, self-sufficient all day long, sneaking up close and landing crucial hits. She's acceptable with just her powers as shown, and very good with the trait Stealth, but it's the Steal Energy that tips her over into greatness.
